title: 'The hwriter package: Composing HTML documents with R objects'
abstract: HTML documents are structured documents made of diverse elements such as
  paragraphs, sections, columns, figures and tables organized in a hierarchical layout.
  Combination of HTML documents and hyperlinking is useful to report analysis results;
  for example, in the package arrayQualityMetrics, estimating the quality of microarray
  data sets and cellHTS2, performing the analysis of cell-based screens.
